name: BubbleX
description:
Between space gladiators there's an ancient slogan: "Same color and you'll reach the top".

Bubble X is a 3D first-person shooter videogame based on the classic Puzzle Bubble  where you must survive giant pillar attacks. An adictive and frenetic videogame where  you'll have to play with perspective to find out which color combination fits with your current bullet to destroy as much pillars as you can.

Made with Unity 2018.4.1f1
